name: Melee Stance
description:
Physical DMG dealt by character is converted to Hydro DMG.
After the character uses Charged Attack: Apply Riptide to target character.
Character deals +1 DMG to target characters with Riptide attached.
After Skills are used against characters affected by Riptide: Deal 1 Piercing DMG to the next opposing off-field character. (Twice per Round)

Duration (Rounds): 2
